title: My first magic video
brief_description: A dazzling array of tricks for children aged 5 to 9 to prepare and perform at home. A professional magican explains the secrets, in step-by-step detail, shows how to make the props and deliver the “patter” to create a spectacular magic show. Tricks shown include: Magic Scarf, Magic Wand, Spotted Tie Trick, Conjurers Cone, Vanishing Silks, Colour Change Silks, Dancing Matchbox, Levitating Genie, Baffling Bunny Box, Ring and Rope, Ribbon Fountain Finale.
